sentences.sentence: This vintage high-waisted one will be it. I can feel it.
sentences.translation: 这件老式高腰是我的款，我感觉到了。

sentences.sentence: High waisted meet waist position in the waist line above the skirt.
sentences.translation: 高腰型接腰位置在腰围线以上的裙子。

sentences.sentence: For short torso, steer clear of boxy fits, low-waisted jeans are best.
sentences.translation: 矮小身材的，不要穿宽松的款式，低腰的牛仔裤最合适。
